sand.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts
sand.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a mixture of sand and cement
I have sand in my shoe.
sand.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: We were just sitting on the sand.
sand.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: a substance that forms beaches and deserts, or an area of this substance
He could see several small figures out on the sands.
an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake
How about a day at the beach?
a large area of land where it is always very hot and dry, and there is a lot of sand
They crossed the desert by camel.
a hill made of sand near the sea or in the desert
We went for a long walk along the dunes.
The dunes are home to a wide variety of birds and plants.
sand.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with sandpaper or using a special piece of equipment
